metadata.title: CVE-2024-35999 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb3: missing lock when picking channelCoverity spotted a place where we should have been holding thechannel lock when accessing the ses channel index.Addresses-Coverity: 1582039 ("Data race condition (MISSING_LOCK)")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
